0: The whole hotel staff were very accommodating and happy to help with any requests
This is Singapore where the pursuit of a dollar is paramount
All the staff we came across were very helpful
Good service make me feel happy
Would stay here again as it is so easy to get around Singapore from with lots of buses just round the corner and the MRT only being aprox 5 minute walk
A big thanks to Delilah the Guest Manager for her assistance when I had lost a piece of luggage
Now to the evening buffet why anyone would want to go anywhere else I do not know we ate there every night and my goodness what a feast the rays and the crab yummy
1: But hey it was really fast for the key to come
Will consider staying here again next time
We waited nearly an hour for our cases to be sent to our room
I stayed first time here arranged by Customer
Well this is not my mistake but was the hotel who mistaken in the calculations
It was so international in the make up of the hotel guests
The hotel is very conveniently located however it appears to be an older facility
Mrs Ms Erna provided the best service one could think of she is absolutely fabulous
2: I think she should explain about separated seating area before she bring guests there
How do I get an invoice of Orchard Hotel where I stayed
Bose sound system was not working in first 2 rooms given to me
I quickly texted Yen hoping to just borrow one from her female staff she had given me her HP upon checking in but I had not expected to use it haha
A three night stay while we explored Singapore before going on to the Maldives
Breakfast is good limited choices but still love it
Upon noticing that we had two young children with us the staff clairifed whether we would prefer an extra bed instead if a cot
During the stay my son got fever quite high up to 40 degrees Celcius and vomited
Free Range of Chicken Breast was not grilled properly as there are still slightly undercoked chicken breast
